load shapefile:
import geopandas as gpd
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
print(shp.head())
plot shapefile:
import geopandas as gpd
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
shp.plot()
filter shapefile by attribute:
import geopandas as gpd
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
filtered = shp[shp['column'] == 'value']
print(filtered)
get shapefile crs:
import geopandas as gpd
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
print(shp.crs)
reproject shapefile:
import geopandas as gpd
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
reproj = shp.to_crs('EPSG:4326')
print(reproj.head())
calculate shapefile area:
import geopandas as gpd
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
shp['area'] = shp.geometry.area
print(shp.head())
dissolve shapefile by attribute:
import geopandas as gpd
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
dissolved = shp.dissolve(by='column')
print(dissolved)
load raster:
import rasterio
with rasterio.open('file.tif') as src:
    print(src.profile)
plot raster:
import rasterio
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
with rasterio.open('file.tif') as src:
    plt.imshow(src.read(1), cmap='viridis')
    plt.show()
read raster band:
import rasterio
with rasterio.open('file.tif') as src:
    band1 = src.read(1)
    print(band1.shape)
get raster crs:
import rasterio
with rasterio.open('file.tif') as src:
    print(src.crs)
get raster bounds:
import rasterio
with rasterio.open('file.tif') as src:
    print(src.bounds)
clip raster by shapefile:
import rasterio
import geopandas as gpd
from rasterio.mask import mask
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
with rasterio.open('file.tif') as src:
    out_image, out_transform = mask(src, shp.geometry, crop=True)
    print(out_image.shape)
calculate zonal statistics:
import geopandas as gpd
import rasterio
from rasterstats import zonal_stats
shp = gpd.read_file('file.shp')
with rasterio.open('file.tif') as src:
    stats = zonal_stats(shp, src.read(1), affine=src.transform)
    print(stats)
raster to numpy array:
import rasterio
import numpy as np
with rasterio.open('file.tif') as src:
    arr = src.read()
    print(arr.shape)
